data.name: Hero's Adventure - Canvas of Heroes
data.detailed_description:
"Canvas of Heroes" DLC expands on the original Hero’s Adventure by offering a new collection of character portraits, exploring and experimenting with the game's art style.

This cosmetic expansion pack DOES NOT affect the core gameplay, making it perfect for players who simply appreciate this style.

The pack includes over 200 portraits in the new art style, covering nearly all key characters, designed to showcase the unique elegance of the martial world's inhabitants in a fresh artistic style.

  • Compatible with the base game and the DLCs "Her Vanishing Silhouette" & "The Great Conquest";

  • New portraits are fully integrated across story dialogues, character creation screens, character encyclopedias, and combat interfaces;

  • Upon purchase, new portraits are enabled by default but can be switched freely via the game settings.

This expansion introduces over 200 new character portraits, each designed to add a distinct flair and enhance the visual storytelling throughout the game.
